column5: Hows the weather in NW Ontario ( around Minaki and red lake) is it still real hot or is it not too bad on the water with a breeze. Comming up tomorrow and just trying to get a handle on what to bring
go to www.weather.com, put in Red Lake, Canada and get the ten day forecast.Good luck and enjoy!!
Just go here and type in Red Lake. Good forecast, but temps in Celcius. theweathernetwork.comEnjoy...RocFish
